original_text: The Lord says this to Judah's enemies: ‘March through the vineyards of Israel and Judah, and destroy the vines. But do not destroy them completely. Pull the branches from the trees. Do this, because these people do not belong to the Lord. 5: The vineyards and the vines are probably a picture of the nations of Israel and Judah, and their people. The Lord says this to Judah's enemies:
korean_text: 너희는 그 성벽에 올라가 무너뜨리되 다 무너뜨리지 말고 그 가지만 꺾어 버리라 여호와의 것이 아님이니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord says this to Judah's enemies
March through the vineyards of Israel and Judah
But do not destroy them completely
Pull the branches from the trees
because these people do not belong to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 이 백성들이 주께 속하지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: The vineyards and the vines are probably a picture of the nations of Israel and Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 포도원과 포도나무는 아마도 이스라엘과 유다 민족들의 그림일 것이다

sentences.original_text: The Lord says this to Judah's enemies
